roleset.name: come to know
roleset.note: REALIZE-V NOTES: Comparison with know and conclude. Member of Vncls conjecture-29.5-1, discover-84. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from realize.01-v)
REALIZATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to realize.01. VN classes conjecture-29.5-1 and discover-84. Framed by Katie. (from realization.01-n)

example.name: duh!
example.text: Once he realized that Paribas's intentions weren't friendly, he said, but before the bid was launched, he sought approval to boost his Paribas stake above 10%.

example.name: both args
example.text: the company 's realization that the industry 's poor performance stems from its failure to give customers what they want
example.arg: that the industry 's poor performance stems from its failure to give customers what they want

example.name: both args again
example.text: there is "growing realization" *ICH*-1 around the world [that denial of intellectual-property rights harms all trading nations]-1

roleset.name: cause to come about, create
roleset.note: REALIZE-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from realize.02-v)
REALIZATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to realize.02. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from realization.02-n)

example.name: strange source
example.text: Its cereal division realized higher operating profit on volume increases, but also spent more on promotion.

example.name: more typical source
example.text: Profits-1 realized *trace*-1 from these trades would then be shared by the conspiring brokers.

roleset.name: as things really are
roleset.note: REALISTIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from realistic.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: That show was , for its time -LRB- 1962 - 68 -RRB- , sophisticated and realistic , compared to stuff like " The Man From U.N.C.L.E. " and " The Saint " which frequently bordered on the goofy .
example.arg: compared to stuff like " The Man From U.N.C.L.E. " and " The Saint " which frequently bordered on the goofy

example.name: both args
example.text: Ja-Mes Logan says 11 wins is realistic for Ole Miss

roleset.name: actual, substantial
roleset.note: REAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia (from real.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: It 's real and there will be a sequel unless it flops .

roleset.name: of all numbers, rational and irrational
roleset.note: REAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia (from real.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: If a complex number is real, then the complex part would be zero.
